attributes.action: reduce road tax for chreished cars which cover less than 3500 miles per year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Owning a cherished vehicle, particularly European made Jaguar, Rolls Royce and Bentley, BMW and Mercedes is now taxed highly due to the engine size. Many of these vehicles are now used for special occasions only and cover low mileages as smaller vehicles, motor-bikes and public transport are instead used daily. Such vehicles are not polluters as they cover less than 3500 miles per year, verified by the MOT certificates.

As minimal polluters, these vehicles should not be taxed to the same extent as those used for chauffeur drive and daily commutes.

The increased tax levels will result in cherished vehicles being scrapped, this process in itself is a polluter.

Suggestion of a road tax level of £100 for cars covering less than 3500 miles per year.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/lower-road-tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
